queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

select concat('MRN_SPE05#LI',mpr.pr,'#',mpr.pr) DD , mpr.pr PR , mpr.type Type , mil.BA , mil.AO , IFNULL(mpr.name_nl, mpr.description) Name , left(mpr.matman,1) 'Sec' , concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',mpr.matman,'#0#',mpr.matman) 'MM' , concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',mpr.LS,'#0#',mpr.LS) 'LS' , if(mpr.spec_complete='Y','MRN_SPE03#F04#Y','MRN_SPE03#F15#N') 'SpecOK' , if(mprv.status='T',concat('MRN_SPE09#03#DSTAT#',mprv.status,'#0#',mprv.status),concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#MRN_SPE09#03#DSTAT#',mprv.status,'#0#',mprv.status)) 'status' , if(mil.budget=0,concat('MRN_SPE03#F13#',mil.budget),mil.budget) Budget , if(mprv.status='T' AND mil.com_committed =0, concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#',mil.com_committed),mil.com_committed) Committed ,mil.sum_ordered 'Ordered' ,mil.sum_invoiced 'Invoiced' ,mil.sum_paid 'Paid' ,concat('MRN_SPE01#PREQ&arg1=',mpr.pr) L ,mprv.pr_version 'Version' from mrqr_pur_req mpr inner join (select pr ,max(pr_version_id) vs_id from mrqr_pur_req_ver where year<='pYEAR' group by pr)max on mpr.pr=max.pr inner join mrqr_pur_req_ver mprv on mprv.pr_version_id=max.vs_id left join mrqr_imputation_lines mil on mil.pr=mpr.pr
where (length(replace(replace('pMATMAN','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pSECTION','%',''),'_',''))=1 OR length(replace(replace('pPREQ','%',''),'_',''))>=2 ) and IF('pMATMAN'='',true,mpr.matman='pMATMAN') and IF('pSECTION'='',true,left(mpr.matman,1)='pSECTION') and IF('pDIVISION'='Sys',left(mpr.matman,1) in ('S','R','F','N'),left(mpr.matman,1) in ('C','I')) and IF('pPREQ'='',true,mpr.pr like 'pPREQ') and IF('pYEAR'='',true,mil.year='pYEAR')
select concept_general, concept_operational, concept_technical, concept_logistical, renewal_contract, origin_pr, reference, codification_clause from mrqr_pur_req where pr='pPREQ'
select pr_version, type, year, status, requestdate, estimated_price, reconduction, reconduction_version, reason, program from mrqr_pur_req_ver where pr='pPREQ'

Select D.dossier ,max.version , c.seqno , d.status , d.ordonnateur , d.comments , c.role , concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',c.org,'#0#',c.org) 'Org' , c.result , if(c.result='TIC','MRN_SPE03#F04#Y','MRN_SPE03#F15#N') TIC , c.actual_startdate , c.actual_enddate , c.comments 'CircComments' from mrqr_dos d inner join (select dossier_id , max(dossier_version) version from mrqr_dos group by dossier)max on max.dossier_id=d.dossier_id inner join mrqr_dos_circlist c on d.dossier_id=c.dossier_id where d.dossier='pPREQ' order by c.seqno

Select mil.year ,mil.DOPA ,mil.BA ,mil.CT ,mil.AO ,mil.catalog 'Cat' ,mil.GL_ACCOUNT 'GLA' ,mil.pr_type 'Type' ,mil.A2 ,mil.description ,mil.budget ,mil.sum_pr ,mil.sum_ordered ,mil.com_committed ,mil.com_scheduled ,mil.com_launched_ini ,mil.com_launched_cur ,mil.com_substitute ,mil.final
from mrqr_imputation_lines mil where mil.pr='pPREQ' order by mil.year
